title: #114 – Russ Tedrake: Underactuated Robotics, Control, Dynamics and Touch
description: Russ Tedrake is a roboticist and professor at MIT and vice president of robotics research at TRI. He works on control of robots in interesting, complicated, underactuated, stochastic, difficult to model situations. Support this podcast by supporting our sponsors.
